website_summaries.verdict: Hydrates, looks natural, and minimizes imperfections – this translucent loose powder does it all without looking heavy or pale.
pros: Has light-deflecting ingredients that blur lines, pores, and other imperfections
Only a small amount is needed
Feels lightweight and doesn't look cakey
Does a great job setting liquid foundation and cream products
cons: Has a light scent that may not please everyone
Can be messy if you use the puff that comes with it

customer_reviews.title: I have sensitive skin but...
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin. That being said, I still want to help you all out by being your little "canary in the mine." This canary keeled over. I broke out so bad using this. Not a surprise, it's a common reaction for me. So I went to Sephora and asked the make-up expert for a product like this. They looked at the ingredients in horror, "Girl, there are some things in here you should never put on your skin no matter your sensitivity." Unfortunately I didn't think in the moment to ask which ingredients those were, but I went with a more natural brand and I haven't broken out since.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great Loose Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I was an avid Air Spun powder user before trying this product. I purchased it on a whim to use for my wedding day makeup. I absolutely love this powder!! It provides an air brushed flawless quality to the skin after application. I apply it after my liquid foundation, concealer and regular powder. I think it really kept my makeup locked in from sweat as well. It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! I use it as a setting powder and it goes on smooth and natural looking! I use a big soft brush to put on my face after I have applied my foundation. I have very dry skin on top of rosacea on my cheeks and all I can say I definitely recommend this product. Does not make your face look cakey or flaky like other setting powders I used to have. A little bit goes a long way and it does not make you look ghostly white.
customer_reviews.author: Cpaz

customer_reviews.title: HEAVILY fragranced
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even try this because as soon as I opened the powder a STRONG floral scent slapped me in the face. It gave me an immediate headache and I don’t even want to know what it would do to my face. If you’re not sensitive to fragrance you’ll probably be fine as the powder did seem to be very finely milled and translucent
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Amazingggg
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow. This stuff works so well. I’ve been using airspun and it’s been making my face so dry and itchy during the days so I decided to go with this one. My skin looks like it’s photoshopped but it’s REAL LIFE lol. Super blurring and it’s lightweight as well. I’m amazed. I stopped my doing my makeup to come and write this review. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl

customer_reviews.title: Great Setting Powder for Normal/Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have normal to dry skin. With a flat kabuki blush this powder can create a flawless look on top of my foundation. It smells like baby powder to me, but it does not bother me, it's actually quite pleasant. I would definitely be purchasing this again if I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Rani Kartikasari

customer_reviews.title: I love this powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder!!! I’m so glad I found it. It’s the most subtle and sheer translucent powder I’ve ever used. So great for setting foundation/concealer. It sets without looking cakey AT ALL. Perfection. Please L’Oréal, never discontinue this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: youth in a jar
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I am 45, I have typically dry skin with an oíly t-zone in the heat and humidity. I recently noticed it's time to start wearing makeup since I now have some skin discoloration, dullness, you know all the pleasures of getting older. I applied the translucent powder after applying lotion, foundation and concealer and as you can see, it's beautiful. Left my skin looking fresh and moist and supple. I am in love. This product definitely gave this seasoned lady a bright little boost 🖤🖤🖤
customer_reviews.author: Fari

customer_reviews.title: Best powder for under Eye Bags
customer_reviews.text: So, as a beauty influencer I am always trying to figure out ways to cover our flaws. I have pretty much mastered the technique of shadowing under the eyes and this is one of the main products I used to do this. Highly recommend. Xoxo Haley
customer_reviews.author: Haley Fox Blog

customer_reviews.title: Blurs fine lines, great finishing powder.
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite finishing powder. I had to stock up since loreal is replacing this with a smaller container and this color. Boo hoo.
customer_reviews.author: decdiva

customer_reviews.title: Amazing setting powder!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for the perfect loose setting powder, and I think I finally found it! Once this sets on your skin, it makes your skin look flawless. It feels very light, but sets foundation perfect without looking and feeling cakey. It also keeps your skin feeling soft, and like skin, rather than skin with something on top of it. My makeup looked beautiful all day while wearing this. It does have a very light scent, but nothing overwhelming. This also does not seem to set into fine lines the way other powders do. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: McGee

customer_reviews.title: After alot of research from multiple resources I chose this.  Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 58 and quit using Bare Minerals powder many years ago, as it sat in my lines and made me look older. The makeup I use (Image or Pur) is a pretty dewy finish, and matte is more flattering at my age. So I apply a light dusting of this after I'm finished applying concealer and foundation. It "lays" over the foundation vs. settling into it. I've noticed that foundation even stays on my nose longer, which has always been a problem. I'm sensitive to scents, and this is scented. However, it's not unpleasant (just unnecessary in my opinion). The scent fortunately does not linger.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernBelleAtl

customer_reviews.title: Covers nicely
customer_reviews.text: I liked it a lot. I got the translucent and it goes well over my liquid coverup. It’s not cakey looking and makes my face look softer in a way. It has a perfume smell but it really isn’t as strong as people are saying. I almost smell a light baby powder hue. I almost want to try the colored one but I will wait till I finish this one
customer_reviews.author: Hasan Alqattan

customer_reviews.title: It's true to description
customer_reviews.text: I use my loose powder right after I finish my foundation, it sets really well and have a lovely smell, it's translucent so it blends very well with my skin tone to give me that natural look. Love it will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lashana

customer_reviews.title: Great finishing powder
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this powder a try after reading good reviews. I am so glad I did. I put it on over my favorite foundation and it looks amazing, gives my skin a glow and doesn't look dry. It doesn't accentuate my fine lines. It feels light and silky on my skin. Great product for me.
customer_reviews.author: KYKellyK

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: What I like most is that this product blends well and covers well. It has been difficult for me to find this product in any stores so I am grateful that I can find in here on Amazon:)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, in the medical profession, specializing in dermatology, told me this was a little something I could get her for Christmas. If she likes it enough to ask for it, I feel safe in recommending it!
customer_reviews.author: Dream Queen

customer_reviews.title: Smells but works
customer_reviews.text: I super love this product. I have super oily skin around my mouth and nose but now this helps alot! I use this product as a powder and I think it's way better then my regular mineral powder. The only thing is I BROKE OUT! I only used it 2 times and I have acne bad. But I have a feeling it's from the scent. It has a really strong smell to it like if it's old lady perfume. So most likely not gonna use it again but my face is really sensitive!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Best powder I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this powder is amazing. It works better than the expensive brand I was using previously. I have keratosis, and blotchy red cheeks. This stuff makes me look airbrushed. It doesn't make you cakey, and I don't have to apply it constantly. Seriously, it looks like I have a filter on my face, but it's real life. Worth the money, just try it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The Coty Airspun powder for my generation
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this for years, tried Bare Minerals Mineral Veil, but for the money this works just as well. I do not use the puff provided, but apply with a big brush.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin. Multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. I have dry skin. But prefer a matte finish. Other translucent powders dry me out and look crusty because they are meant for oily skin. THIS however does not! Perfect for setting makeup, baking, and I also use it in the crease of my eye on top of eyeshadow to prevent lines from forming!
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good for dry, crepey skin
customer_reviews.text: I am 63 with years of sun damage. Very dry, very crepey with many wrinkles. The powders I have really loved so far: LOreal Hydra Perfect, Cover Fox Perfect Setting Powder and W3ll People Bio Brightening Loose powder. All are excellent. Have yet to try Hourglass. I have a lonnnnggg list of powders I hate...
customer_reviews.author: Robin Adkins

customer_reviews.title: very light and doesn't get cakey on face
customer_reviews.text: My face is very very oily. I did try this over my tinted moisturizer just to balance out my face and give it a little of a matte look. I love it !!! product doesn't transfer that much like other powders. A little goes a long way. Wish I can take picture but my phone camera sucks :( trust me get it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: michelle r

customer_reviews.title: not good for dry under eyes and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: If you have oily skin then you're probably going to get more use out of this product than people who have dry skin like me, it made my under-eyes look/feel so dry. It smells like an old lady's perfume and it isn't in a good way. You can smell the product on ur face even though I only used it for my under eyes and forehead. The product seems good for oily to normal skin types
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for adding no extra color to the face. set the makeup perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drugstore buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Amazon because I originally bought it at Walmart I believe and couldn’t find it at our stores anymore. The scent might be a bit too much for some people but I love it, it’s subtle and not strong like Coty Airspun. I bought the Translucent powder and it does a very good job without breaking the bank. I apply it after my foundation and concealer and it doesn’t cake up.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: dupe for too faced
customer_reviews.text: I really like the too faced ethereal powder and this is super close to that formula. Keeps the skin looking fresh and non cakey and dewy almost but not wet. Great for touchups too
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: Loose powder for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I love that it doesn't have a scent and it leaves my skin looking soft and feels soft. I have a very oily forehead and eyebrows so this helped tons when I applied it. It lasted me 8 hours total without reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina G

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do it for me on a hot Summer day
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder. I use it as a setting powder for some really great foundation I recently bought on Amazon. Although I was looking for something sheer, this is almost too sheer for me. I like more coverage and it only lasts a short while in the Summer heat. I'm okay with this powder but, will probably try something different next time.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love this finishing powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite loose powder. It goes on smooth and doesn't ever look cake-y. I see some reviews about the scent, but I wouldn't even call it a scent. It's so subtle, you almost miss it, and I love it. I have to stock up because I'm afraid they'll discontinue it! Best.Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic on me and does not accent wrinkles. I am not into the "shiny" look and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: linda blake

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using the ridiculously expensive powder she got at department stores, and I asked her to try this one just once. She liked it well enough that I ordered two more containers of it. I trusted L'Oreal because I had done some technical consulting for them, and they went strictly "by the book."
customer_reviews.author: AlaProf

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. But can be too much if u don’t really like perfume
customer_reviews.author: Newyokker!!!

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Great setting powder! Lasting, good smell, can use for a baking powder. The amount in the container will last me forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Light and good coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is a pleasant surprise. Light, sheer, but coverage is very good. And last for a pretty long time. I am not sure if sweat can wash it out since I did not do heavy exercise. I have tried several different powders but this is the best face powder I have used.
customer_reviews.author: VD Studio

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: I actually prefer this over Laura Mercier, nyx, and any nother setting powder that is used for baking. I feel like it's light and and you don't see it in your fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: MK&DJ

customer_reviews.title: Smells awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: YOU NEED THIS!! I was looking for an inexpensive powder to set with and I was not disappointed! AND it smells so good!! I’ve had some in the past that smelled awful lol. It sets really nice and keeps my makeup in place all day!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck with this product I highly recommend it alongside other L’Oreal products goes on easy with a clean brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tacothecatemily_official

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Beauty Staple!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love, LOVE this powder!! I’m 44 yrs old and still deal with oily skin and this powder sets my foundation beautifully with NO FLASHBACK!! It didn’t settle into my large pores and actually blurred them perfectly!! Even with my medium olive complexion the translucent shade didn’t make me look ghostly nor did it oxidize the color of my foundation!! Light, clean scent didn’t bother me one bit with my sensitive nose (allergies from hell, lol)! Would definitely keep buying this! My new Favorite Staple to my beauty routine! Thanks L’Oreal!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Guilloty

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The stuff is great, it shrinks the look of pours. A little goes a long way, makes my face look professional done. Its great
customer_reviews.author: Sn0wWhiteQu33n

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years!! By far my favorite! It lasts me a long time and I love the light scent. It keeps my foundation in place and feels very light.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Cross

customer_reviews.title: Good light coverage powder
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice powder to set your foundation and concealer with. Although, I wish it would last a little longer and provide more co enrage. But, if you want a light powder that wont irritate your skin, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is for very light skin ONLY.
customer_reviews.text: This is for very light skin. It also has a strange shimmer to it. Clown face. I wouldn't use it if my skin was fair.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha D

customer_reviews.title: Just too drying for me
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin and found this to be very drying and exacerbated my skin texture. It also left a distinct color residue that was very gray. I went back to my Revlon translucent powder and gifted this one to my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The absolute worse!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, does not apply well at all, it's actually too light weight and just falls off the pad or makeup brush & makes a mess,plus the fact it really smells nasty. Would not recommend, total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft Powder
customer_reviews.text: I usually only wear origins or expensive powders but I am very pleased with this powder. I mix this with my mineral powder and it ads a nice fresh soft glow to my face. I am more pleased with this powder than I thought I would be. I bough this powder on other positive reviews. Great for touch ups through out the day with the powder puff or powder brush.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really work except to make your face matte. So, if you have oily skin and that's what you're looking for, then this is for you. It doesn't really set makeup all that well and doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K.

customer_reviews.title: UNREAL!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i'M 63 VERY DRY SKIN... I've used uaura mercier, Dermablend and wander beatuy among others and this is hydrating, very sheer and looks fantastic. Picture will follow. AND THE PRICE IS INCREDIBLE!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: marian romain

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about makeup, but I was having professional pics taken and this was a recommend product to help. It is light weight, it helped the foundation set with a nice matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L Evans

customer_reviews.title: Does not crease in skin.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I do not wear powder because of my dry skin, I thought hey I'll give it a try. Talk about amazing. It is perfect for my skin and really helps to set foundation. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: peggy s.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I love that it has a soft scent to it. It works great
customer_reviews.author: MaLuMa Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have both acne-prone and oily skin and my skin can also get a lot of fine lines especially when I haven't had enough sleep or it's dry out. This powder has worked wonders for me. I plan on continuing to use it for the foreseeable future. It smells luxurious and amazing and makes me look forward to putting on makeup. I have pale skin with redness and it evens me out. The only downside is you need to reapply after a few hours but I can't think of a powder that doesn't need that. It also helps concealing my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is it's not great for sensitive skin. It does make my face itch after an hour or so. Other than that it works pretty good. Matches skin tone and I like the coverage. Over all it's a decent poweder
customer_reviews.author: Andrew olson

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Putting this on over my foundation has made my skin look very nice, very very nice! And at the rate I need to use it, it will last me for quite some time. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Creates a great finish
customer_reviews.text: It's funny that scent is a star rating because I actually like the scent a lot. My previous setting powder was too matte and cakey, this one gives me flawless-looking skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Waves

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again! Recommend for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder it was exactly what I needed for my dry skin and for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Genna Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Been using this forever, Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This powder never shows my pores, especially the ones around my nose which are most obvious. It is super light weight and hydrating, but it doesn't work as well on oily skin in compares to dry skins.
customer_reviews.author: A Tian

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING COVERAGE
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerhouse product for the price point . Covers well without the heaviness. Gentle scent without the heavy perfume . So recommend you try it .
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Not very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for an under eye powder that wouldn’t dry out, but this one doesn’t work for me. The smell reminds me of old lady perfume and lasts almost all day. I was hoping it would be more hydrating, but it left me looking too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lola L

customer_reviews.title: My favorite setting powder!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the translucent shade and it's perfect for setting makeup without drying, flaking, or accentuating pores. It has a slight scent, nothing too over powering and it dissipates quickly. Definitely the best setting powder for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this powder and it matched perfectly to my skin tone. Would definitely purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, smells great, and great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Such a lightweight, great coverage product! The scent is really nice. I find that make often Smells like off putting smells play dough mixed with chemical. However - this product has a soft pleasant scent. I love the light feel too
customer_reviews.author: Crutcher

customer_reviews.title: My new go to powder!
customer_reviews.text: This powder works beautifully to set my foundation! I was using another product, but I'm definitely sticking with this one from now on. The translucent powder is finely milled and just seems to sit over my foundation perfectly. I actually made my purchase due to someone's review on here, can't remember who it was, but thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbles

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this product is how hard it is to get the powder thru the holes. Other than that I've loved the look it has on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna B.

customer_reviews.title: Just my shade
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, completely satisfied. I sometimes use it as eyeshadow as well. Makes a smooth base to wear alone or apply eye color with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Christy

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get past the perfume scent this product has. Overall, it is great but has way too strong of a scent for me.
customer_reviews.author: Praise

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: This loose powder smells fine and covers lightly and makes for a nice finished look. I wish it would last all day, but unfortunately it does not.
customer_reviews.author: CAV

customer_reviews.title: No no and no
customer_reviews.text: It made my face look so dry and full on powdery... not gonna use again. Smelled fine. Perhaps ok for under-eyes, but not good for a whole face powder.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Its very long lasting lasted 15 hrs for me I never believe in this stuff because I have such sensitive skin that breakouts to so many products but this is so awesome it smooth and last forever
customer_reviews.author: Abie c.

customer_reviews.title: Too strong of perfume smell
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great product if the smell did not take my breath. Can’t wear it, but I like it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Stiner Miller

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: So this product does collect in your creases. I’m not very impressed with this. Might be great for younger women.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Girl

customer_reviews.title: My One-and-Only Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to powder. I use it daily and bought several to have in back-up. Perfect shade and coverage. I use it to set my foundation and it’s great. I love the plastic jar. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F.

customer_reviews.title: Smells strong
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to use and had a very strong odor. It was breaking out my face. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: GaGa

customer_reviews.title: Great for older skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a finishing powder to blend everything out. It creates a nice 'blur' and smoothness to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: A. Russell   Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is really light and it's hard to get out of the jar. It is a really cheap version of bare minerals. I guess ya get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: FluffyEskimo

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Powder
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this face powder. It makes my complexion look like porcelain.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best powder ive used. This blends beautifully, very light smell and is perfect for oily skin!
customer_reviews.author: Megan w

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage for the price
customer_reviews.text: Has good coverage and very reasonably priced. Stays on all day. Is hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jackkkieg

customer_reviews.title: Powder applies really well. Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this powder is applied and how it goes on the skin. Extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McNeely-Kirwan

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baking powder. The powder is very fine. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this wont choose any other product! Face so smooth and imperfections gone!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia campion

customer_reviews.title: Very light coverage
customer_reviews.text: The coverage is minimal. Would not recommend as full coverage. Or even medium coverage.
customer_reviews.author: jamie underhill

customer_reviews.title: Looks good on
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not overpowering and the powder works well with my make up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this when I put it on. I love the look of it for contouring. It’s very nice. I’ll be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: nice texture
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer a fuzzy cloth versus the one that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: You should have it
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish it gives to my face once I apply it on! It’s a really good product
customer_reviews.author: Mareling Balladares

customer_reviews.title: Stay Sure Powder
customer_reviews.text: Loved this powder. I have been buying expensive powders to set my foundation. This one works great!!! Value for money!!!
customer_reviews.author: deedee crooks

customer_reviews.title: Irritates skin, overpowering scent, poor coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a powder dry out and irritate my skin like this one. The sent is overpowering as well. If the coverage was great, I could overlook these things, but I've used much better powders in the past for cheaper that cover up a lot more. I expected a lot better from L'Oreal, just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight , hydrating
customer_reviews.text: The scent is veryyyyy vintage perfume smell but it’s such a good powder. It doesn’t make you feel dry and you can bake with it but it brushes away super silky.
customer_reviews.author: Onjelie Linn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get passed the horrible perfume smell it made me choke!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Wood

customer_reviews.title: Be careful which color you choose
customer_reviews.text: Gives me a little to much color but it's a good product
customer_reviews.author: M C New York

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder. It is sheer but does provide good shine coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Britta Rae

customer_reviews.title: It won’t dry you out, the coverage is light
customer_reviews.text: I just tried it once today, still have to try with other products I use but I like the fact it doesn’t dry my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for your wife.
customer_reviews.text: You can gift it to your wife, she will really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanveer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping fast
customer_reviews.text: Used it for one month already! The powder got so little when I use it .i have to pour out . And it’s mess my table. But the smell is nice ! Maybe it’s just doesn’t fit for my skin . The shipping was fast. Check more detail if it’s for for you skin
customer_reviews.author: Miss snowyrainy

customer_reviews.title: Amazin
customer_reviews.text: I like this translucent powder it's the first time using it but I can tell I will buy this it really helps to keep my make up set I tend to have oily skin so this helps me with that problem
customer_reviews.author: Erika G.

customer_reviews.title: Still Looking For Cornsilk Replacement For Shine
customer_reviews.text: No scent and unhappy with coverage. Miss my Cornsilk powder. I’m sure some like this powder but no oil control. Still looking.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: So far im pleased
customer_reviews.text: the scent is not bad i personally like it hope it doesn't make my face break out but i like it so far especially for the price of it. keeps my face from getting too oily
customer_reviews.author: nelly

customer_reviews.title: Coverage is like baby powder
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use different foundations with this product and the result was always the same. It looked like I caked on white baby powder. It also caused breakouts. Had to throw product away.
customer_reviews.author: KKM

customer_reviews.title: flawless
customer_reviews.text: this powder is silky and has a beautiful finish, will definitely be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Salem

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Hydra Perfecte Perfecting Loose Face Powder, Minimizes Pores & Perfects Skin, Sets Makeup, Long-lasting, with Moisturizers to Nourish & Protect Skin, Translucent, 0.5 Fl. Oz.
product_meta.description: Color:TranslucentL'Oreal Paris Hydra Perfecte Powder is a light diffusing loose powder that minimizes pores and sets makeup into place. It's formulated with special moisturizers that nourish and protect your skin.
feature_bullets: Translucent, loose, silky setting powder provides a touch of coverage to lock in makeup for long lasting wear and a flawless end result
Minimizes the look of pores and skin imperfections for a super smooth makeup result with a modern matte finish
Applicator puff included for easy application press the puff into loose powder, then gently press the puff onto skin, using rolling motions to set powder into makeup
Use all over face after makeup application to perfect and set makeup look ; Focus on oil prone areas forehead, nose and chin as well as under the eyes
Formulated with special moisturizers that nourish and protect skin : In three lightweight shades translucent, light and medium
